Main page — Video Filters — VirtualDub Filters

VirtualDub Filters

Image Processing Filters Free Filters VirtualDub Filters
VirtualDub MSU Logo Remover
The filter is intended to remove logo from films
VirtualDub MSU Tuner TV restore Filter
This filter was designed for TV signal restoration: denoising, from poor signal or from signal with mirror ghosts.
VirtualDub MSU Subtitle Remover
VirtualDub MSU Subtitle Remover
VirtualDub MSU Subtitle Remover / UserGuide
VirtualDub MSU Subtitle Remover Filter User's Manual
VirtualDub MSU StegoVideo filter (video steganography) / standalone executable
Unique tool for hiding information in video (VirtualDub filter/standalone executable)
VirtualDub MSU StegoVideo - filter settings
Unique tool for hiding information in video (VirtualDub filter/standalone executable)
VirtualDub MSU Smart Sharpen Filter
The filter allows to enhance image sharpness with minimum noise amplification
VirtualDub MSU Smart Brightness and Contrast Filter
The filter allows adjusting image brightness and contrast with minimum loss of details, also supports automatic mode
VirtualDub MSU Old Film Restoration
The filter is intended to recover old film by removing vertical scratches, noise, tape defects and other artifacts that can be found in old cinema
VirtualDub Old Color Restoration
Restore old, color faded videos and photos
VirtualDub Old Color Restoration: User Guide
User guide for old color restoration plugin
VirtualDub MSU Old Cinema Filter 2.0
This filter is intended to achieve an "Old cinema" effect
VirtualDub MSU Noise Generation Filter
The filter adds artificial noise of one common types (equidistributed, normally distributed, colour stains, echo signal) to video stream
VirtualDub MSU Noise Estimation Filter
This filter is used to estimate mean noise variance in video sequences
VirtualDub MSU Motion Phase filter
Filter is intended for representation of moving object phases
VirtualDub MSU Motion Estimation Filter
The filter performs multiframe and singleframe motion estimation and compensation in a video stream
VirtualDub MSU Deshaker filter
Results of MSU Deshaker filter
VirtualDub MSU Deflicker filter
Filter is intended for processing video with flicker effect
VirtualDub MSU Deblocking Filter / Deblocking filter for reducing "blocking-artifact" in video data
Filter is intended for recovering quality of video ripped from DVD
VirtualDub MSU Smart Deblocking Filter
Filter automatically determines the blockiness' strength on the frame and in the concrete part of it, the processed video contains maximum details from the original video
VirtualDub MSU Cartoonizer Filter / Converts Movies into Cartoons
The filter is designed for painting, drawing and animated cartoon rendering
